representedOrganization.name: Westside Ear Nose and Throat and Facial Plastic Surgery Center

td.content: s:a f aged 75 years with severe poor night vision, severe gradual decrease in visual field in the left eye, severe difficulty reading and Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. she has had several such episodes over past 2 years. she is a heavy drinker she smokes 1 pack a day o:Height 66 in, Weight 116 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 62, Respiration 15 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

td.content: s:patient presents with severe difficulty reading for 3 days. pt also reports severe poor night vision, severe gradual decrease in visual field in the left eye, Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. she is a white f aged 75 ys. she smokes one pack a day she drinks alcohol heavily for the past 2 years o:Height 67 in, Weight 119 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 16 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Multifocal Electroretinography.

td.content: s:F retired aged 76 years presents with severe poor night vision x 12 days. patient also complains of severe difficulty reading, severe gradual decrease in visual field in the left eye. she smokes one pack/day of cigarettes she drinks at least 4 beers a day o:Height 66 in, Weight 116 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

tr.td: Westside Ear Nose and Throat and Facial Plastic Surgery Center

td.content: s:pt presents with severe difficulty reading, severe poor night vision. pt also reports of severe gradual decrease in visual field in the left eye. patient is a 76 yo f. she is a heavy drinker patient has a one pack per day habit o:Height 67 in, Weight 119 lbs, Temperature 99.1 F, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed vitamin A - 50000 IU see comments, and ordered retinal cell transplantation - Left eye.
